column4: omg. i've been running ubuntu for over three months now, and i just got my first pop up: is your computer running slower than usual, run winantivirus scan now, your computer infected ... i thought this din't happen on linux???!!!
i guess it was a web popup
i tried to nav away from the page, and it gave me the 'you haven't finished scanning yet' routine
remove the virus with killlall firefox-bin
